brief_summary.textblock:
To investigate the relationship between the combined Lu AF35700 and Lu AF36152 plasma
      concentration and D2 dopamine receptor occupancy up to 172 hours after oral dosing of Lu
      AF35700

clinical_study.brief_title: D2 Dopamine Receptor Occupancy After Oral Dosing of Lu AF35700 in Healthy Men Using [11C]-PHNO as Tracer Compound

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Healthy young men >=25 and <=45 years of age with a Body Mass Index (BMI) >=18.5
             kg/m2 and <=30 kg/m2.

        Other protocol-defined Inclusion and Exclusion criteria may apply.

intervention.description: One 30 mg single dose for one day; orally
Daily dosing: 10 mg for 3 days, 20 mg for 3 days, 45 mg on Day 7; orally

clinical_study.official_title: Interventional, Open-label, Positron Emission Tomography (PET) Study Investigating D2 Dopamine Receptor Occupancy After Oral Dosing of Lu AF35700 in Healthy Men Using [11C]-PHNO as Tracer Compound

overall_contact.last_name: Email contact via H. Lundbeck A/S

overall_official.last_name: Email contact via H. Lundbeck A/S

oversight_info.authority: United Kingdom: Medicines and Healthcare Products Regulatory Agency

primary_outcome.measure: Relationship between plasma concentrations and pharmacodynamic (PD) measures specified as binding potential at each scanning time point
Relationship between plasma concentrations and PD measures specified as plasma concentrations of Lu AF35700, Lu AF36152 and Lu AF35700 + Lu AF36152 at each scanning time point
Relationship between plasma concentrations and PD measures specified as occupancy in relation to plasma concentrations of Lu AF35700, Lu AF36152 and Lu AF35700 + Lu AF36152, respectively

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Columbia Suicide Severity Rating Scale (C-SSRS) (Part B only)
Area under the curve (AUC), maximum observed concentration (Cmax), oral clearance (CL/F), and apparent elimination half-life (t½)

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics/Dynamics Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
